CHAT.comment: MOHAMED ALI SAMANTAR, Petitioner v. BASHE ABDI YOUSUF, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SHAY DVORETZKY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PATRICIA A. MILLETT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER FOR THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SHAY DVORETZKY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:08 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
